title: Sweet and sour orange sauce
ingredients: ['475ml water', '220g soft brown sugar', '3 tablespoons red wine vinegar', '2 tablespoons orange zest, or to taste', '1 tablespoon soy sauce', '1/4 teaspoon ground ginger', '1/8 teaspoon hot chilli sauce', '1/8 teaspoon white pepper', '1 pinch cayenne pepper', '3 tablespoons cornflour']
